text:
I was motivated
to take the AWS cloud practitioner

training as it was afforded to us
by IBM leadership, and highly encouraged for

us to go out and do that training
as we are a key partner with AWS.

I thought the training was highly relevant
to my role and it took something

that's pretty complicated and put it in
very generic speak for someone

like me to be able to easily understand
how it applies to my current role,

one of the most valuable trainings
I've probably taken in quite some time.
